title: ImThour
author: ImThour
content: Hi all,This thread can be used for discussions about Polygon and it's price movement.You are free to post any new information, updates, price analysis, technical analysis and fundamental analysis related to $MATIC.All the Holders are requested to stay active in this thread and provide latest information.No particular rules but let's try to make it Polygon centric thread, try to reduce OFF Topic Posts.Make sure you guys have fun and indulge as much as possible.This thread is an inspiration from Wall Observer BTC/USD.At the time of creating this thread, $MATIC is trading at $0.9062Disclaimer: All posts in this thread are for entertainment purposes only. Nothing in this thread should be construed as financial advice.
